00024 class TilesItep : public LCFixedObject<NTIINT,NTIFLO,NTIDBL> {
00025   
00026 public: 
00027   
00030   TilesItep(int TileSize, int SIPM, float Voltage, float VoltageBreakdown, float Delta_SPE, 
00031             float Phe_MIP , float Temp, float Current, float CurrentRMS, float DarkRate0, 
00032             float DarkRateHalf, float DarkRateHalfCorr, float PedRMS, float PeakWidth, float XTalk) {
00033 
00034     //Set the integer values
00035     obj()->setIntVal( 0 , TileSize  ) ;
00036     obj()->setIntVal( 1 , SIPM  ) ;
00037     //Set the floating values
00038     obj()->setFloatVal( 0, Voltage ) ; 
00039     obj()->setFloatVal( 1, VoltageBreakdown);
00040     obj()->setFloatVal( 2, Delta_SPE ) ; 
00041     obj()->setFloatVal( 3, Phe_MIP ) ; 
00042     obj()->setFloatVal( 4, Temp ) ;
00043     obj()->setFloatVal( 5, Current );
00044     obj()->setFloatVal( 6, CurrentRMS );
00045     obj()->setFloatVal( 7, DarkRate0 );
00046     obj()->setFloatVal( 8, DarkRateHalf );
00047     obj()->setFloatVal( 9, DarkRateHalfCorr ); 
00048     obj()->setFloatVal( 10, PedRMS ); 
00049     obj()->setFloatVal( 11, PeakWidth ); 
00050     obj()->setFloatVal( 12, XTalk );
00051   }
00052 
00055   TilesItep(LCObject* obj) : LCFixedObject<NTIINT,NTIFLO,NTIDBL>(obj) { } 
00056 
00058   virtual ~TilesItep    () { /* no op*/  }
00059 
00062   int getTileSize() { return obj()->getIntVal(0); } 
00063   int getSIPMID() { return obj()->getIntVal(1); } 
00064   
00065   float getVoltage() { return obj()->getFloatVal(0); }
00066   float getVoltageBreakdown() { return obj()->getFloatVal(1); }
00067   float getDelta_SPE() { return obj()->getFloatVal(2); }
00068   float getPhe_MIP() { return obj()->getFloatVal(3); }
00069   float getTemp() { return obj()->getFloatVal(4); }
00070   float getCurrent() { return obj()->getFloatVal(5); }  
00071   float getCurrentRMS() { return obj()->getFloatVal(6); }  
00072   float getDarkRate0() { return obj()->getFloatVal(7); }  
00073   float getDarkRateHalf() { return obj()->getFloatVal(8); }  
00074   float getDarkRateHalfCorr() { return obj()->getFloatVal(9); }  
00075   float getPedRMS() { return obj()->getFloatVal(10); }  
00076   float getPeakWidth() { return obj()->getFloatVal(11); }  
00077   float getXTalk() { return obj()->getFloatVal(12); }  
00078 
00079 
00080   /* ITEP FILES
00081   curmean.dat - sipm current (uA)
00082   currms.dat - rms of multiple measurement of sipm current
00083   ddelta.dat - sipm gain (adc channels)
00084   ==> NO eeff.dat - number of p.e. for low level light
00085   hhv.dat - chosen hv (V)
00086   hvthr.dat - breakdown point (V)
00087   nnoise.dat - noise at "0" level (kHz)
00088   nnoiset.dat - noise at 1/2 mip level (Hz)
00089   nnoiset_corr.dat - noise at 1/2 mip level corrected to temp=22 C (Hz)
00090   pedrms.dat - pedestal rms (adc channels)
00091   ==> NO pixs.dat - number of pixels for saturation curve measurements
00092   ==> NO pmts.dat - amount of light for corresponding pixs.dat (mip)
00093   ==> NO ppix.dat - number of pixels at low light
00094   ppixm.dat - number of pixels per mip at low light
00095   ssigma.dat - single pe peak width in interpixel distance units
00096   temp1.dat - temperature during test
00097   xxt.dat - sipm cross talk
00098   */
00099 
00102   void print(std::ostream& os);
00103   
00104   // -------- need to implement abstract methods from LCGenericObject
00105   const std::string getTypeName() const { 
00106     return "SiPM_MappingHcal";
00107   }

00111   }
